sentence.Network_en: Sandstorms are common during the Saudi Arabian winter.
sentence.Network_cn: 在沙特阿拉伯，冬季里沙尘暴很常见。

sentence.Network_en: A lone man walks over sand dunes in the Saudi Arabian desert.
sentence.Network_cn: 沙特阿拉伯沙漠上,一个人孤单的走过重重沙丘.

sentence.Network_en: Saudi Arabian people are very cheerful, generous and humorous.
sentence.Network_cn: 沙特阿拉伯人都十分性质高昂, 慷慨和幽默.
